main event: On 22 June 1956, a circular silver gray object was sighted in Ponaca, Nevada, appearing the size of a half dollar held at arm's length.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about five minutes with binoculars,The object was perceived to be traveling in a straight course from west to east,There was a jet aircraft in the area during the sighting,The report evaluated the object as possibly being an aircraft,The observer was a 33-year-old housewife, and no photographs were included.
